page.title: 12LEISURE IN THE CLUNTON AREA
page.content: For many people leisure means active exercise. Gardening is one particularly worth mentioning though many would dispute the word leisure used in this context. There is an active painting and drawing group in Clunton encouraged by a local professional artist. They meet regulary and regulary exhibit at local exhibtions and shows. Handicrafts are an important outlet for some as is shown by the high standard of work in the Purslow Show. There is a wealth of walks in the area for those with a love of exercise or a dog. For those with transport and the inclination there are other activities within reach, music, societies, bell ringing, bowls, amateur dramatics and Women's Institute. For the young there are Youth Clubs in Clunbury and Clun.
